name: Teriyaki Tempeh and Shiitake Mushrooms with Sriracha Soba. Vegan Recipe. Easily Glutenfree.
description: Teriyaki Tempeh with mushrooms and soba noodles. Homemade Vegan Teriyaki Sauce. How to make teriyaki sauce Tempeh & mushrooms. Vegan recipe. Easily Gluen-free. Serves 2
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup low sodium soy sauce/tamari/coconut aminos
1/4 teaspoon garlic powder or a teaspoon of minced garlic
1/2 teaspoon ginger powder or 2 teaspoons minced ginger
4 oz Tempeh (thinly sliced or chopped small)
3-4  bundles of Buckwheat Soba (cook according to instructions. (Or use other noodles, rice or quinoa))

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Soba or other noodles according to instructions.(Cook in boiling water for 6-7 minutes). Drain, rinse in cold water, add Sriracha and toss/mix and keep ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the Soba or other noodles according to instructions.(Cook in boiling water for 6-7 minutes). Drain, rinse in cold water, add Sriracha and toss/mix and keep ready.

recipeInstructions.text: In 2 teaspoons oil, cook the Tempeh over medium heat for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In 2 teaspoons oil, cook the Tempeh over medium heat for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mushrooms and continue to saute until tempeh is golden on the edges. 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mushrooms and continue to saute until tempeh is golden on the edges. 2-3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all the ingredients of the Teriyaki sauce and add to the tempeh.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend all the ingredients of the Teriyaki sauce and add to the tempeh.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook over low-medium heat until most of the sauce is absorbed by the Tempeh and the sauce gets bubbly and starts to caramelize.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook over low-medium heat until most of the sauce is absorbed by the Tempeh and the sauce gets bubbly and starts to caramelize.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the Tempeh and mushrooms to the noodle bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer the Tempeh and mushrooms to the noodle bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a Tablespoon of water to the pan, mix and drizzle the remaining sticky sauce on the noodles.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a Tablespoon of water to the pan, mix and drizzle the remaining sticky sauce on the noodles.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with mung bean sprouts, carrot slivers, cucumber slices etc. Serve hot.
